name: Ek Zindagi, Teen Rastey (One Life, Three Paths)
name_original: Ek Zindagi, Teen Rastey (One Life, Three Paths)
description:
A Pakistani father makes life unbearable for his college-going teenage daughter. As the coming-of-age son will you side with your father in his conservative mindset and authoritarian control of the women in the house? Or will you break free from the patriarchy and help them in living an independent life?

If you are interested to support local stories from Pakistan and brings them into an interactive experience. contact us : info@pixelartga.com
